name: Homebrew
description:
Run this command in Terminal (requires Superuser access):
sh -c "$(curl -fsSL https://raw.githubusercontent.com/Linuxbrew/install/master/install.sh)" Time to install: Several minutes (to resolve deltas) Homebrew is a third-party package manager. It allows you to quickly and easily install other programs. IMPORTANT: After install, run these 2 commands in Terminal echo 'eval "$(/home/linuxbrew/.linuxbrew/bin/brew shellenv)"' >> /home/kali/.zprofile eval "$(/home/linuxbrew/.linuxbrew/bin/brew shellenv)" Then run this: brew install gcc
